section.title: Behavior
section.para: There is a special keyword lambda for this purpose. By writing a function definition without the keyword def and replacing the function name with the keyword lambda, that definition becomes an expression which evaluates to a closure.

example.caption: Simple example of a lambda
example.programlisting:
def onetwosum(f) = f(1) + f(2)
onetwosum( lambda(x) = x * 3 ) {- identical to: def triple(x) = x * 3 onetwosum(triple) -} -- evaluates to 9
